explains: adj. 不愿意的；不情愿的；勉强的

sentences.en: She is tough, unwilling to take no for an answer.
sentences.cn: 她很难对付，不答应不肯罢休。

sentences.en: The directors were unwilling to respond to questions.
sentences.cn: 董事们不愿意回答问题。

sentences.en: Judges were unwilling to nullify government decisions.
sentences.cn: 法官们不愿废止政府决定。
